item.description:
Hi everyone! This week several people have offered to post their writing. I believe John, Ty, and Kate have all posted something for us to read and comment about this upcoming Tuesday. Please continue to offer your insight and thoughtful commentary. It really is appreciated so much by your fellow writers.

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there trying to save seats and reading
item.name: 20-30 Something Creative Writers of Boston February Meetup
